document_data.name: Main-gauche
document_data.mainbody: A '''main-gauche''' was a large [[dagger]] that had a basket hilt.
document_data.History: The main-gauche was used as a defensive tool in the wielder's off hand which was usually their left. The basket hilt of the weapon made it much easier to parry and even disarm opponents.
document_data.Notable Main-Gauches: * ''[[Tinris]]'', an ancient [[enchanted]] main-gauche made of [[everbright]] [[steel]] that was wielded by the [[Smiling Viper]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/93/A Fool's Errand: The Viper Comes To Ravens Bluff|20}}
document_data.Notable Users:
*[[Mordmorgan]], a [[swashbuckler]]-adventurer from [[Cormyr]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|30|Mordmorgan}}
